Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV6height.name: height
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV6height.abstract: The number of rows in the matrix.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV5widthS.name: width
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV5widthS.abstract: The number of columns in the matrix.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV9flatte.name: flattened
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV9flatte.abstract: The elements of the matrix, flattened into a single array.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAVAByxGSi.name: init(height:width:elements:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAVAByxGSi.abstract: Creates a new Matrix from a nested Collection type.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAVAByxGSi.name: init(height:width:repeating:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAVAByxGSi.abstract: Creates a new Matrix that will be inhabited by a single, repeated value.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAVAByxGSi.name: init(height:width:dataSource:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAVAByxGSi.abstract: Creates a new Matrix that will be populated by a closure supplied by the caller.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV10repop.name: repopulate(_:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV10repop.abstract: Repopulates the matrix with new elements, using a closure supplied by the caller.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV11forEa.name: forEachCell(body:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV11forEa.abstract: Calls the given closure for each cell in the matrix, supplying the coordinates of the cell as well as the element in the cell.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV3rowSay.name: row(_:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV3rowSay.abstract: Returns an array of elements corresponding to a row in the matrix.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV6column.name: column(_:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV6column.abstract: Returns an array of elements corresponding to a column in the matrix.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV4rowsSa.name: rows()
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV4rowsSa.abstract: Returns a nested array of all of the elements in the matrix, sorted by rows.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV7column.name: columns()
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV7column.abstract: Returns a nested array of all of the elements in the matrix, sorted by columns.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV3mapABy.name: map(_:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV3mapABy.abstract: Returns a matrix of the same dimensions containing the results of mapping the given closure over the matrix’s elements.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV9subscr.name: subscript(_:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV9subscr.abstract: Returns an element in the matrix, located using a flat index.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV9subscr.name: subscript(_:_:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV9subscr.abstract: Returns an element in the matrix, located at a specific row and column.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV7elemen.name: element(row:column:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV7elemen.abstract: Returns an element in the matrix, located at a specific row and column. Does the same thing as subscript(row:column:), except returns nil if the coordinates are out-of-bounds.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV9operat.name: operation(lhs:rhs:operation:)
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAV9operat.abstract: Can be used to perform any element-for-element binary function between two matrices.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAVAAs9Equ.abstract: Returns true if the matrices have the same dimensions and contains equal elements at corresponding coordinates.

Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAVA2A0A11.name: connect()
Structs/Matrix.html#/s:6MatrixAAVA2A0A11.abstract: Establishes connections to neighboring elements for all elements in the matrix.

Protocols/MatrixConnectable.html.name: MatrixConnectable
Protocols/MatrixConnectable.html.abstract: MatrixConnectable is a protocol which, when conformed to by an element stored in a Matrix, allows that object to be automatically connected by a reference to its neighboring elements in the matrix, by calling the method connect() on the Matrix.
